name: 蘇評揮
objective:
本課程在於讓學生對於新能源車輛產業及其工程實務有廣泛的了解，產業面包括產業現況、法規、政策、動力系統技術，工程實務則涵括動力、傳動、能源、控制等系統之開發及維護，及車輛業界產品開發中心及維修廠之企業參訪。課程中之動力系統將包括半複合動力、全複合動力、純電動車及氫燃料電池系統，能源系統將討論鉛酸電池、鎳氫電池、鋰離子電池，及其充放電機制及管理系統。
1.To educate student to have a general comprehensive knowledge on green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, powertrain technology and its Industry Engineering Practice including the development and maintenance processes of the powertrain, transmission, energy, control systems, and the industry practice at the product development center or the service station of the car company. 
2.The powertrain system will include the mild-hybrid, full hybrid, pure motor drive, and fuel cell systems. The energy system will include the introduction of the lead acid, nickel-metal hydride, and lithium-ion batteries, and their charging-discharging mechanism and its management devices.
3.This class will lead the students to be able to learn the process of the green vehicle development and also to have an opportunity to receive the lectures from the car maker experts on the car maker product development center or the service station.
schedule:
Wk 1-3: EV Global Trend & Industry Status
Wk 4-6: EV System Design
Wk 7-8: Team Project Design and Presentations
Wk 9:     Mid term written test
Wk 10-12: Propulsion System Design
Wk 13-15: Energy System Design
Wk. 16-17: Vehicle Control System Design 
Wk 18: Final written test
scorePolicy:
Team Presentation  Mid Term 20%
Mid Term Written test 20%
Team Presentation Final 30%
Final Written test 30%
